answers.answer: Definitely sounds like the symptoms of a stroke, BUT my husband had this exact same thing happen, we were all terrified it was a stroke, and it ended up being very bad vertigo, caused from an ear infection he had no symptoms of. It also could be an early sign of preeclampsia, I would definitely, definitely get checked out.
Everything ktowne said go get checked!!!!

I have had vertigo for a long time! They can't give me anything for it due to the baby plus everytime they try something new it don't work! If I don't get to feeling better I will call the doc! I probly should have went in but at our hospital they leave u in the waiting room for 10+ hours then u never see the doc. I get so impatient! But yea I am gonna call my doc office when they open and just see what they say! Thanks everyone! I don't feel so alone now!
Did you end up calling your doctors office? How are you feeling now?

Yea I called and they just said if it happend again to call 911. No help really cause baby boy still moving good! But my vision started messing with me again earlier right before my daughter got home! Still have the headache really bad! On verge of migrane now! They told me to take tyl for my head but it isn't helping and my lower back and my neck is killing me!
I would really get checked if you can go in, hope you feel better, keep us posted!!
I will! I just wish I felt better!

I hate chronic migraines, they started in my third trimester with my last, and have had them ever since. It's  just like stroke symptoms, so god help me if I ever do have a stroke because I will think it's a migraine. I get all of those exact symptoms and constantly throw up, and sometimes the symptoms will last for three days. It's miserable, especially now that I'm pregnant again and can't take my typical pain medicine. I would recommend getting phenergan, it eases nausea, but also will help you sleep off the migraine which seems to be the only cure for them.

I had this happen and actually pretty much blacked out in the middle of the store but my mom was there catch me and sit me down. The Er just told me I was low blood sugar, dehydrated, and had uti. The baby was moving and fine whole time.

These are also signs of pre eclampsia, blacking.oit slurred speech etc BE CAREFUL if.yo even so much as feel like this.again defo call 911 it is not something to tke a risk on, thats so scary, relax have water and be careful!

question: So yesterday I started feeling really weird! Almost like tunnel vision or if u black out and just start to come too. But I never blacked out! My bp was great just a bit high for me it was 106/62 my hr was 99. Yes I have low pressure and fast hr always have. But after about 30 min of the drunk feeling and tunnel vision started I was on the phone with my mom and my speech started to slur. Then I couldn't remember or even think of how to say a word. Then I noticed my whole right side head face mouth hand arm leg everything was numb. To the point I couldn't even hold a pen to write a number down. Then the headache kicked in it was almost as bad as a migrane. This morning I got up and my vision is still weird its like I have stared in a bright light for a long time. The kinda sparkle look after. And the headache is still there but not as bad! My ob wanted me to go to ER and get checked for a stroke but I'm hard headed and plus the flu is going around real bad and didn't want my daughter up there around all the sick people in the ER. My baby has been moving really good so I'm not so much worried about him. But my question is: Has anyone else had this happen and if so what was the cause! I'm 35+3 due feb 1 by section!
title: any help please! scared !!!!!!
